name: unnerve

effect.black-white: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.black-2-white-2: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.black-white: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
